name: Ask for Help
description: Ask a question into your community to helps you

domain.description: The chosen domain of the question

anonymous.description: Whether to ask the question anonymously or not, if anonymous is chosen then the name of the user will not be shown

domainInterest.description: The kind of interest in the domain the user should have to receive the question

beliefsAndValues.description: The kind of similarity in beliefs and values the user should have to receive the question

socialCloseness.description: The kind of social closeness the user should have to receive the question

positionOfAnswerer.description: How close the users should be to receive the question, if nearby is chosen the question has not the possibility to be postponed because the question requires a fast answer

maxUsers.description: The maximum number of users to which propose the question and also in the case the user requests to ask to more users

maxAnswers.description: The maximum number of answers before reaching the expiration of the queston

expirationDate.description: Incremented epoch datetime from creation of the task, indicating the task expiration

answerTransactionLong.title: Transaction to mark large answers on the incentive server

answer.description: The answer given by the user to the question

anonymous.description: Whether to answer the question anonymously or not, if anonymous is chosen then the name of the user will not be shown

publish.description: Whether to publish the answer or not

publishAnonymously.description: Whether to publish the answer anonymously or not, if anonymous is chosen then the name of the user will not be shown

reason.description: The reason why the question was reported

transactionId.description: The id of the picked answer transaction

reason.description: The reason why the specific answer was picked

expirationDate.description: Incremented epoch datetime from creation of the task, indicating the task expiration

transactionId.description: The id of the answer transaction that was reported

reason.description: The reason why the specific answer was reported

transactionId.description: The id of the answer transaction that was liked
The id of the answer transaction from which started a follow up

taskId.description: The id of the task associated with the question

userId.description: The id of the user who proposed the question

domain.description: The chosen domain of the question

anonymous.description: Whether to ask the question anonymously or not, if anonymous is chosen then the name of the user will not be shown

positionOfAnswerer.description: How close the users should be to receive the question, if nearby is chosen the question has not the possibility to be postponed because the question requires a fast answer

taskId.description: The id of the task associated with the question

transactionId.description: The id of the transaction associated to the answer

userId.description: The id of the user who answered the question

anonymous.description: Whether the user prefers to answer the question anonymously or not, if anonymous is chosen then the name of the user will not be shown

taskId.description: The id of the task associated with the question

question.description: The question for which was picked the answer

transactionId.description: The id of the transaction associated to the answer

taskId.description: The id of the task associated with the question

question.description: The question for which was picked the answer

listOfTransactionIds.description: The ids of the transactions associated to the answer

norms.description: Obtain the possible users to ask
norms.ontology: :- use_module(library(random)). :- dynamic get_app_users_to_ask/1,send_expiration_event/0. get_app_users_to_ask(AppUsers) :- get_app_users_except_me(UsersExceptMe), random_permutation(AppUsers,UsersExceptMe). send_expiration_event() :- get_task_attribute_value(ExpirationDate,'expirationDate'), get_now(Now), wenet_math(Delay,ExpirationDate-Now), send_event(TimerId,Delay,'notifyQuestionExpirationMessage',json([])), put_task_state_attribute('timerId',TimerId).

norms.description: Calculate domain dimension if it is indifferent or the domain is 'sessitive issue'
Calculate domain dimension if it is similar and domain is not 'sessitive issue'
norms.whenever: is_received_event('sortUsersByDiversity',_) and not(get_task_attribute_value('sensitive_issue','domain')) and get_task_attribute_value('similar','domainInterest') and get_task_state_attribute(Users,'appUsers') and get_task_attribute_value(Domain,'domain') and domain_attributes(Domain,Attributes)

norms.description: Calculate domain dimension if it is different and domain is not 'sessitive issue'
norms.whenever: is_received_event('sortUsersByDiversity',_) and get_task_attribute_value('different','domainInterest') and get_task_state_attribute(Users,'appUsers') and get_task_attribute_value(Domain,'domain') and domain_attributes(Domain,Attributes)

norms.description: After caluclated the matching go to rank them
Call the social context builder to rank the user by its match
When the task is created filter the posible users to ask about and ask them
norms.ontology: :- dynamic who_to_ask/1.   who_to_ask(Users) :- get_task_state_attribute(Unasked,'unaskedUserIds'), get_task_attribute_value(MaxUsers,'maxUsers'),( ( append(Users,NewUnasked,Unasked), length(Users,MaxUsers) ) -> true; ( Users = Unasked, NewUnasked = [] ) ), !, put_task_state_attribute('unaskedUserIds',NewUnasked), !, retractall(who_to_ask(_)), asserta(who_to_ask(Users)).

norms.description: Notify user if it can help with a question
norms.whenever: is_received(_,'notifyNewQuestionAndAnswer',_) and get_task_id(TaskId) and get_task_goal_name(Question) and get_task_requester_id(RequesterId) and get_task_attribute_value(Domain,'domain') and get_task_attribute_value(Anonymous,'anonymous') and get_task_attribute_value(PositionOfAnswerer,'positionOfAnswerer')

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
Provide an answer to a question
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('answerTransaction',Attributes) and not(is_task_closed()) and get_attribute(Answer,answer,Attributes) and get_attribute(Anonymous,anonymous,Attributes) and get_task_requester_id(RequesterId)

norms.description: Notify the questioneer about the answer
norms.whenever: is_received(SenderId,'notifyAnswerTransaction',Attributes) and get_task_attribute_value(ExpirationDate,'expirationDate') and is_now_less_than(ExpirationDate) and get_task_attribute_value(MaxAnswers,'maxAnswers') and get_task_state_attribute(AnswersTransactionIds,'answersTransactionIds',[]) and length(AnswersTransactionIds,AnswersCount) and <(AnswersCount,MaxAnswers) and get_attribute(Answer,answer,Attributes) and get_attribute(Anonymous,anonymous,Attributes) and get_task_goal_name(Question) and get_task_id(TaskId) and get_transaction_id(TransactionId) and get_task_state_attribute(GroupsUsers,'groupsUsers')

norms.description: Send expiration message if received max answers
Notify user of the expiration message
Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('notAnswerTransaction',_) and get_profile_id(Me) and not(get_task_requester_id(Me)) and not(is_task_closed())

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('reportQuestionTransaction',_) and get_profile_id(Me) and not(get_task_requester_id(Me)) and not(is_task_closed())

norms.description: Notify to the users about best answer
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('bestAnswerTransaction',Attributes) and get_profile_id(Me) and get_task_requester_id(Me) and not(is_task_closed()) and get_attribute(TransactionId,transactionId,Attributes) and get_transaction(Transaction,TransactionId) and wenet_actioneer_id_of_transaction(ActioneerId,Transaction)

norms.description: Notify the user that its answer is picked
Ask more users
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('moreAnswerTransaction',Attributes) and get_profile_id(Me) and get_task_requester_id(Me) and not(is_task_closed()) and who_to_ask(Users) and get_task_attribute_value(ExpirationDate,'expirationDate') and is_now_less_than(ExpirationDate) and get_task_state_attribute(AnswersTransactionIds,'answersTransactionIds',[]) and length(AnswersTransactionIds,AnswersCount) and get_task_attribute_value(MaxAnswers,'maxAnswers') and <(AnswersCount,MaxAnswers) and get_attribute(NewExpirationDate,expirationDate,Attributes)
norms.thenceforth: add_message_transaction() and send_messages(Users,'notifyNewQuestionAndAnswer',json([])) and cancel_expiration_event()  and put_task_attribute('expirationDate',NewExpirationDate) and send_expiration_event()
norms.ontology: :- dynamic cancel_expiration_event/0. cancel_expiration_event() :-  get_task_state_attribute(TimerId,'timerId',''), ( TimerId = '' -> wenet_log_error('No previous event to cancel'); ( wenet_interaction_protocol_engine_delete_event(TimerId) -> true ; wenet_log_error('Cannot cancel previous event'))).

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('closeQuestionTransaction',_) and get_profile_id(Me) and get_task_requester_id(Me) and not(is_task_closed())

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('reportAnswerTransaction',_) and get_profile_id(Me) and get_task_requester_id(Me) and not(is_task_closed())

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('likeAnswerTransaction',Attributes) and get_profile_id(Me) and get_task_requester_id(Me) and not(is_task_closed()) and get_attribute(TransactionId,transactionId,Attributes) and get_transaction(_,TransactionId)

norms.description: Nothing to do with this transaction only store it
norms.whenever: is_received_do_transaction('followUpTransaction',Attributes) and get_profile_id(Me) and not(get_task_requester_id(Me)) and not(is_task_closed()) and get_attribute(TransactionId,transactionId,Attributes) and get_transaction(_,TransactionId)
